partnerDetails.about:
Schultz & Erbse is part of the itsme Group, an independent, technical provider of both electrical and mechanical products, services, and solutions. With 550 dedicated employees in 5 countries (The Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Romania and Spain), we help machine building; industrial end-users; and module building companies to increase revenue, reduce risk and decrease cost.

We differentiate ourselves by offering both technology and supply: the unique combination of a very broad Mechanical and Electrical portfolio with proven logistical expertise, as well as state-of-the-art automation technology know-how and expertise. With our strong IT backbone and logistical systems, we can manage and control your supply, including long-tail. Our independent technical consultants help you to address your industrial automation challenges with consultancy services and hands-on training.

We are fully leveraging the latest digital technologies, processes and tools to ensure our customers to find, select, design, build, maintain and deliver their products with the shortest time to market.

With our recently introduced Digital Platform, we do not only offer an e-catalog with over 2M products for industry and mechanical engineering, but also many tailored self-service functionalities for our customers’ daily work, such as: clear overviews of orders, deliveries, invoices and even offers. As a result, our customers can see their current status anytime, around the clock. Always in real time!
